dashboard.noOtherHalves: You have no other halves yet.

welcome.title: Welcome to Avoca-do! ü•ë
welcome.howItWorks: How to Find Your Other Halves
welcome.explanation: Avoca-do helps you connect with like-minded people who share your interests and passions. To start discovering your perfect matches and building meaningful connections, you'll need to tell us what you're passionate about!
welcome.footerNote: Once you've selected your interests, you'll start seeing suggested other halves and can begin connecting with amazing people who share your passions!
